document_data.name: Mistcliff
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mistcliff''' was a steep, volcanic cliffside located along the northwestern coast of [[Chult]]. It was situated between the [[Mistcliff Mountains]] to the south and the [[Shining Sea]] to the north.
document_data.Description: It extended 1000 feet (304 meters) out of the crashing waves to the jungle above. It was over 200 miles (320 kilometers) long.
document_data.Inhabitants: The cliff was home to several large groups of [[aarakocra]]s along with populations of [[pteranodon]]s and [[quetzalcoatlus]]es.
